1.0.0.name: wordpress/omt-on-air
1.0.0.description:
This WordPress widget will display what automation (OMT iMediaTouch) is reporting as "playing", or if nothing is playing, it displays 'Live DJ' or some other text.

It's a configurable plugin: You can change the title, the default program (currently 'Live DJ') which displays when nothing is 'playing', and the location of the callsign_band.xml file generated by iMediaTouch On Air (which of course you must have turned on.)

If your WordPress is hosted on the same system as the xml file, you can tell it to grab the file directly, otherwise you specify the URL and it is retrieved.

You can also turn on (or off) the use of ajax, which when on, will update the xml file and display every two minutes.

The output can be generated as an unnumbered list or plain.
